title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Inquiry-Based Special Relativity Theory VR Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics concepts (velocity, time, space)

learning_goals: Accurately explain the principle of light speed invariance and time dilation phenomena through VR simulation with over 80% accuracy.
